introduction: The learning resources in this pathway are intended to support the development of professors that teach in the Structure and Function curricular block. This includes the subjects of Anatomy, Physiology, Embriology, and Histology. The resources are grouped into two sub-paths: Structure and Function Instructor and Structure and Function Designer. The instructor path and the accompanying assessment provides a description of the Laureate Learning Model for Structure and Function and guidlines for the application of S&F tools in the classroom. The Designer path includes instruction on how to plan for a session using the S&F tools.
